description: Contains Home Health Outcome and Assessment Information Set (OASIS) noadd single items.

columns.name: OASIS_SET_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the OASIS data set.

columns.name: OASIS_DATA_SET_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of OASIS data set.  Links to category list ZC_OASIS_DATA_SET.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


SOC/ROC


Follow-up


Transfer


Discharge

columns.name: OASIS_SET_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
OASIS data set status.  Links to category list ZC_OASIS_SET_STATUS.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


New


Visit Complete


Marked for Submission


Submitted


Accepted


Rejected


Voided


In Progress


Ready for 3rd Party


Sent to 3rd Party

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.  Links to table PAT_ENC.

columns.name: OASIS_VERSION_C_NAME
columns.description:
OASIS version.  Links to category list ZC_OASIS_VERSION. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


01.30


01.40


01.50


01.60


02.00


02.11


02.12


02.20


02.21


2.30.0


2.31.0


3.00.0

columns.name: ADDENDUM_YN
columns.description:
This is a flag that indicates whether an addendum has been created for an OASIS assessment contact since the last time the dataset was submitted to the state. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: CUR_OASIS_LOCK_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current lock status of the OASIS assessment data set. Links to category list ZC_OASIS_LOCK_STAT. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Unlocked


Locked

columns.name: DATASET_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores what type of dataset the record is. Currently datasets can be OASIS or HIS.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


OASIS Dataset


HIS Dataset

columns.name: ADND_3RD_EXPORT_YN
columns.description:
This is a flag that indicates whether an OASIS assessment contact has had an addendum created since the last time the dataset was submitted to a 3rd party. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ADDENDUM_YN

columns.name: LAST_ADDENDUM_DATE
columns.description: This is the date of the last addendum created for an OASIS assessment contact.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the patient associated with the data set.
